title: WhatsApp is making group chats better with Message Reactions, Communities, and more
content:
WhatsApp is one of the most popular instant messaging (IM) apps worldwide. Billions of people depend on the Meta-owned service to contact their loved ones for free. We also utilize it to reach businesses, get deliveries, and provide customer support. Despite its slow development when compared to some of its rivals — like Telegram —

The post WhatsApp is making group chats better with Message Reactions, Communities, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp has revealed several improvements coming to group chats, including Message Reactions, larger file sharing, Communities, and more.
